mapper.insert: insert into houseroom(hno, no, roomName, deposit, rent, enterdate, minStay, maxStay, roomPeople, furniture, incFurniture, userid) values (roomsq.nextval, housematesq.currval, #{roomName}, #{deposit}, #{rent}, #{enterdate}, #{minStay}, #{maxStay}, #{roomPeople}, #{furniture}, #{incFurniture}, #{userid} )
